languages.text: {n}Мастер орудий захлебывается словами, которые явно собирался выпалить, не подумав. Бросив на вас взгляд, он отворачивается.{/n} "Премного извиняюсь, Лорд-капитан. Простите дурака... корабль в руинах, каждый второй офицер мертв, и Лорд-капитан больше не с нами. Страх овладел мной".

{n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер орудий захлебывается словами, которые явно собирался выпалить, не подумав. Бросив на вас взгляд, он отворачивается.{/n} "Премного извиняюсь, Лорд-капитан. Простите дурака... корабль в руинах, каждый второй офицер мертв, и Лорд-капитан больше не с нами. Страх овладел мной".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before lowering his gaze.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

{n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

languages.text: {n}军械大师连忙把差点脱口而出的话憋了回去。随后他看了你一眼，扭开了头。{/n}“我深表歉意，舰长大人。请原谅我这个蠢货吧……这艘船变得破破烂烂，原本的舰长大人也已经离我们而去，我刚刚被吓破了胆。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}军械大师连忙把差点脱口而出的话憋了回去。随后他看了你一眼，低下了头。{/n}“我深表歉意，舰长大人。请原谅我这个蠢货吧……这艘船变得破破烂烂，原本的舰长大人也已经离我们而去，我刚刚被吓破了胆。”

languages.text: {n}El Señor de la Artillería se traga las palabras que estaba a punto de pronunciar sin pensar. Vuelve a mirarte antes de apartar la mirada.{/n} «Lo lamento profundamente, Lord Capitán. Perdone a este imbécil... La nave está hecha trizas, los otros oficiales están muertos y la Lord Capitán ya no está entre nosotros. Me he dejado llevar por el miedo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Señor de la Artillería se traga las palabras que estaba a punto de pronunciar sin pensar. Vuelve a mirarte antes de apartar la mirada.{/n} «Lo lamento profundamente, Lord Capitán. Perdone a este imbécil... La nave está hecha trizas, los otros oficiales están muertos y la Lord Capitán ya no está entre nosotros. Me he dejado llevar por el miedo».

languages.text: {n}マスター・オヴ・オードナンスが思わず口に出しそうになった言葉を押し留めたのは明らかだった。彼は背を向ける前に、今一度あなたに目線を送る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、深くお詫び申し上げます。どうかこの愚か者にお許しを…船は滅び、他の士官は皆死に絶え、ロード・キャプテンがもはや我らとともにいない。恐怖が私を支配しているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・オヴ・オードナンスが思わず口に出しそうになった言葉を押し留めたのは明らかだった。彼はこちらに視線を送ってから目線を下げる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、深くお詫び申し上げます。どうかこの愚か者にお許しを…船は滅び、他の士官は皆死に絶え、ロード・キャプテンがもはや我らとともにいない。恐怖が私を支配しているのです」

languages.text: {n}Le maître de l'artillerie ravale in extremis les paroles qu'il s'apprêtait à vous jeter à la figure sans réfléchir et vous lance un dernier coup d'œil avant de se détourner.{/n} « Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Veuillez pardonner mon impudence... Le vaisseau est en ruines, tous les autres officiers sont morts et la seigneure-capitaine n'est plus parmi nous. Je me suis laissé submerger par la peur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de l'artillerie ravale in extremis les paroles qu'il s'apprêtait à vous jeter à la figure sans réfléchir et vous lance un dernier coup d'œil avant de se détourner.{/n} « Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Veuillez pardonner mon impudence... Le vaisseau est en ruines, tous les autres officiers sont morts et la seigneure-capitaine n'est plus parmi nous. Je me suis laissé submerger par la peur. »

languages.text: {n}Der Artillerieoffizier verschluckt die Worte, die ihm offenbar fast herausgerutscht wären. Er sieht dich erneut an, ehe er wegblickt.{/n} "Ich bitte vielmals um Entschuldigung, Lord Captain. Ich bin ein Narr, verzeiht ... Das Schiff ist zerstört, jeder zweite Offizier ist tot, und der Lord Captain ist nicht mehr unter uns. Die Angst hat mich ergriffen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Artillerieoffizier verschluckt die Worte, die ihm offenbar fast herausgerutscht wären. Er sieht dich erneut an, ehe er den Blick senkt.{/n} "Ich bitte vielmals um Entschuldigung, Lord Captain. Ich bin ein Narr, verzeiht ... Das Schiff ist zerstört, jeder zweite Offizier ist tot, und der Lord Captain ist nicht mehr unter uns. Die Angst hat mich ergriffen."

languages.text: {n}Mühimmat Ustadı, belli ki düşünmeden pat diye söylemek üzere olduğu sözcükleri yutuyor. Sana bir bakış daha attıktan sonra gözlerini indiriyor.{/n} "Çok ama çok özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Aptallığımı bağışlayın. Gemi harabeye döndü, subaylarımızın çoğunu şehit verdik ve Lord Kaptan artık aramızda değil. Korkuma yenik düştüm."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Ordnance chokes back the words he was obviously about to blurt out without thinking. He casts another look at you before turning away.{/n} "I apologise profusely, Lord Captain. Pardon the fool... The ship is in ruins, every other officer is dead, and the Lord Captain is no longer with us. Fear has taken hold of me."

Sana bir bakış daha attıktan sonra gözlerini indiriyor.{/n} "Çok ama çok özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Aptallığımı bağışlayın. Gemi harabeye döndü, subaylarımızın çoğunu şehit verdik ve Lord Kaptan artık aramızda değil. Korkuma yenik düştüm."
